comment: there is a list of streaming services . From that list , we came up with this : Netflix is the only service North America , Europe , & Australia have in common . Amazon Prime & Apple TV + are both North America , Europe for sure .
amr:

                  :mod (o / only)

                                          :op1 "Europe"))
                              :op3 (c4 / continent
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Australia"))))))

            :ARG1-of (s5 / sure-02)))
